I really wish I had wi-fi to check in to this place while I was there this past week.  The food here is AMAZING!!  you won't go wrong with anything on their menu.  i highly recommend the deep fried camenbert cheese served with the raspberry sauce, house crouquettes, the meat "bomb", both mushroom dishes, and the jamon iberico tapas.  the best part is, its in the middle of a neighborhood, away from the hustle and bustle of tourists so you'll see lots of locals sitting around and enjoying their family time.  i happened to be there during a FCB match and it was AWESOME!  the restaurant was filled with groups of families cheering and watching the game.  this place was so good i went there twice during my trip and it was a 3 day trip.
